		function flyoverCookieExists()
        {
	        var bFlyCookie = (Cookies.Get("FlyOverDisplayed") != null);
	        var bFlyEnabled = false;
	        	        
	        // if there is no cookie but the flyover is enabled, tell flash to play the flyover

		        return true;
	        }

                    }
                    i++;
                });
                showHideDisclaimer(this);
            },
            scroll: {

                    jQuery(".legal-disclaimer", this).stop().hide();

            return "en".toLowerCase();

        function showHideDisclaimer(obj) {
            if (jQuery(".disclaimer-text", obj).html().toString().replace(/ /gi, '').replace(/\n/g, '') == "") {
